arts.ttl: Neymar's agent holds Barcelona transfer talks despite Brazil return
arts.sum: Neymar recently returned to boyhood club Santos on a short-term deal but his agent, Pini Zahavi, has offered the forward to former club Barcelona on a free transfer

arts.ttl: ‘We’re angry about the last 10 minutes’ - Cubarsi
arts.sum: Pau Cubarsi admitted his team were angry after letting slip a 4-2 lead against Atletico in the first leg of their Copa del Rey tie on Tuesday night. “We are angry because it is a draw.

arts.ttl: Barca’s crazy Copa del Rey showing is cruel on Cubarsi
arts.sum: Despite having only just turned 18 Cubarsi plays the game like a veteran, and for someone so young to have such an appreciation of the defensive art is truly inspirational. If ever there was a game that showed the need to get an extremely high defensive line exactly right, this was it.

arts.ttl: Flick 'angry' after Barça let late lead slip vs. Atleti
arts.sum: Barcelona coach Hansi Flick was angry at letting a two-goal lead slip against Atlético Madrid but happy with the overall performance as Tuesday's Copa del Rey semifinal first leg ended in a remarkable 4-4 draw.

arts.ttl: ‘We have to learn’ - Pedri speaks out after Barca’s wild draw
arts.sum: Pedri admitted he had mixed feelings about Tuesday’s wild 4-4 draw with Atletico Madrid in the Copa del Rey. Barcelona went 2-0 down but recovered to go 4-2 up before a late collapse saw the visitors salvage a draw in an incredible first leg.

arts.ttl: FC Barcelona Next Five Games: March 2025 Match Schedule
arts.sum: Barcelona play pivotal games in La Liga and Champions League that could make or break their season before March's FIFA international break.

arts.ttl: European football: Barcelona and Atlético in eight-goal semi-final thriller
arts.sum: Both sides fight back from two-goal deficits in 4-4 draw Inter sink Lazio in Coppa Italia; Werder Bremen stunned Barcelona and Atlético Madrid both rallied from two goals down in a frantic 4-4 draw in the first leg of their Copa del Rey semi-final at the Estadi Olímpic Lluís Companys. Atlético took an early lead with goals from Julián Álvarez in the first minute and Antoine Griezmann in the sixth, but the home side had levelled the game by the 21st minute thanks to two goals two minutes apart from Pedri and Pau Cubarsí. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Atletico deny Barcelona in thriller while Arminia Bielefeld stun Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Cannes also sprung an upset on an evening of cup action around Europe.

arts.ttl: Ratings: Sørloth steps up again as Atlético, Barça play out a Copa del Rey classic
arts.sum: However, late goals from Marcos Llorente and, that man again, Alexander Sørloth meant the match ended 4-4. Atlético Madrid kept their Copa del Rey hopes alive by mounting another late comeback in the home of FC Barcelona in their Copa del Rey semifinal first leg.

arts.ttl: Barcelona 4-4 Atletico Madrid: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Griezmann, Lewandowski serve up eight-goal thriller
arts.sum: Barcelona and Atletico Madrid play out an eight-goal thriller in the first leg of their Copa del Rey semi-final at the Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys on Tuesday night.
